title: 'Love Island U.K.', 'Real Housewives', 'FBoy Island', 'Siesta Key', and 'Big Brother' | Reality Top Five
description:
1. Callie sells Juliet on her favorite reality show, 'Love Island U.K.', and explains the difference between the U.K. and U.S. series (0:45).
2. Callie and Juliet discuss the success of the 'Real Housewives of Potomac', the abject failure of 'New York', and the dramas of 'Beverly Hills' (16:00).
3. Juliet convinces Callie to binge 'FBoy Island' on HBO Max this weekend (35:35).
4. Callie explains the ins and outs of the Florida lifestyle as seen on 'Siesta Key' (45:00).
5. Callie discusses her second-favorite reality show 'Big Brother', which is now on Season 23 in the U.S. (54:50).
Follow the ‘Ringer Reality TV Podcast’ on Spotify or subscribe wherever you get your podcasts. Also on this feed: Amelia Wedemeyer recaps 'Bachelor in Paradise' on Tuesday nights exclusively on Spotify, and Johnny Bananas recaps 'The Challenge' on Wednesdays.
Hosts: Juliet Litman and Callie Curry
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
